short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collaboratively annotate, highlight, and tag web pages and PDF documents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluating electronic logos (eLogos) is a grading tool for web-based technical reports. It allows instructors to define a custom rubric and apply it while assessing web pages and PDF student submissions.
